description.value: The symbol of Orcus, a mace and skull, is carved into every bodak's chest. A harvester can carefully remove the skin, resulting in a dark leather sheet with the scarred symbol. Powerful curses can be created using this symbol. Before the expiration, a creature can spend 6 hours and 5gp for alchemical ingredients to dry and treat the mark, allowing it to retain its magic abilities without expiring.
